Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
Unique – Dread: Gain 4 ability power for each stack of Glory.

Unique – Dark Pact: Gain ability power equal to 2% bonus health.
Unique – Azakana Gaze: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take「 ( 6.4% / 4%) of their maximum health as total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 ( 1.6% / 1%) of their maximum health as magic damage every second over 4 seconds. 」

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Voidborn Resilience: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units, heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VOIDBORN RESILIENCE: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power

Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health
+45 armor
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist, up to a maximum of 25 stacks. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from Dark Seal.
Unique – Dread: Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory, up to 125 at maximum stacks, and 10% bonus movement speed if you have at least 10 stacks.
